name: Shivam Gupta
content: KY has always been close to my heart. We are happy to announce that Kashiyatra is back in it's full potential after a break of almost three years due to the Covid Pandemic. It gives me immense pleasure to invite you to join us, as we embark on this MYSTICAL VOYAGE!

name: Vanshika Singh
content: Myself Vanshika Singh from Electronics Engineering placed in Microsoft, For me, KY is really a big celebration. It hypes up not just me but a large numbet of people in the college and even the city. It is something that clearly disproves the fact that IITians are only Nerds.
